title: (46340) Requena - 16 Avenida Capitán Gadea
description: Laundry with parking 50 meters away

title: (46340) Requena - 3 Calle Ferrocarril
description: Alternative to the other secter of Requena, Tranquil

title: (46340) Requena - 19 Calle Albacete
description: Parking in asphalt.

title: (46340) Requena - 48B Calle Desvío Carretera
description: Great parking to visit the city, suitable for large vehicles

title: (46340) Requena - 5 Calle Cuatro Caminos
description: Nice and quiet area next to a park with free gray and black water service and parking next to a very complete picnic area with Barbecues and tables

title: (46390) San Juan - 9 Camino Verdinal San Juan
title_short: (46390) San Juan - 9 Camino Verdinal San Juan
description: Very quiet place. with 4 concrete tables and a built-in barbecue. All surrounded by a fantastic pine forest. As there are no garbage cans, please collect everything after being. Possibility of spending a quiet night if you are on the road.

title: (46391) Requena - 881 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Service area with non-stop shower, a bar with small snack 24h / 24h and a self until 11pm. Ample free parking for spending the night and hitting the road.

name: VERA Estenas
title: (46300) VERA Estenas
description: A beautiful little Bodega situated in the heart of Utiel- Requena Valencia, Spain. Truly a family business. Send an e-mail in advance and ask if they have room, because there may be an event. They respond very quickly to email. Don't miss the wine tour and tasting. They also offer dinner for a very reasonable price. All in all a good place between the vines!

title: (46300) Utiel - Calle Dr. Alejandro Garci, 4B
description:
La Tintorera laundry, two washers and two dryers.
There is a change machine.
Very neat and spacious.

title: (46300) Utiel - 37 Calle el Milagro
description: Municipal and free sector in the city center. Do not leave the premises without visiting the wine museum and the Sanctuary of Remedy located 10 km from excellent wines and sausages

title: (46350) - 168 Plaça Poligono 1-R.S
description: Very quiet place to spend the night. Good views.

title: (46360) Buñol - 213 Plaça Numero 25
description: It is a free camping area, if you go by motorhome or camper you do not need a permit, to park and spend the night it is totally free. It is a beautiful and very comfortable place, with incredible views. It is reached by an unpaved track, but in very good condition. We were going in a motorhome and we arrived without problem. When we arrived there was another parked there.

title: (46350) Chera - 13 Diseminado Chera-r.s
description: Water tap tap. Possible to park right next to it.

title: (46350) Chera - Unnamed Road
description: Awesome place to wake up to.. Stunning, amazing, breathtaking. Enough space for 2 campers

title: (46392) Siete Aguas -
description: Repsol gas station with the possibility of guarded parking, several free parking spaces and a bar-restaurant with a daily menu and grilled meats. Very dirty bathrooms.

title: (46300) - 10B Plaça Poligono 9
description: Near the chapel in repair, with barbecues, picnic tables, toilets and showers. Very quiet and hiking and mountainbike. It is advisable to visit the Hermitage.

title: (46350) Chera - 5 Calle Proyecto 12
description: Quiet place next to orchards. Hardly any traffic.

title: (46351) Chelva - Unnamed Road
description: Small space on the edge of a dirt road to rest in peace near the vineyards. Nice view, no shade. There is a little less flat, on a wasteland next to the larger vehicles, but it is still more advisable for vans.

title: (46350) Chera - 2 Plaza la Iglesia
description: water source at the church

title: (46392) Siete Aguas - 14 Calle Manuel de Falla
title_short: (46392) Siete Aguas - 14 Calle Manuel de Falla
description: A wide field with trees very close to the center of Siete Aguas. Quiet place where you can spend the night. The big CAs better have to make a maneuver before turning towards the open field. Mine is 6mt and perfect.

title: (46392) Siete Aguas - 10 Avenida la Fuente
description: Laundry in the center of town, possibility of parking about 70 meters

title: (46392) Siete Aguas - Vía Pista
description: Fuente de la Roca picnic area. Quiet area on the outskirts of the town of "siete aguas". It is 5 minutes walk from the center. The place is not very well maintained, but you have 3 tables with benches, a fountain with drinking water and a garbage can. The atmosphere is very nice. It is a wooded area and the children had fun in the environment.

title: (46350) Chera - 4 Calle Proyecto 11
description: Free service area for gray and black water filling and emptying cars. With climbing areas, hiking trails and mountain biking.

title: (46350) Chera -
description: Plain next to the swamp without shade but a few meters further back there are tables, barbecues and shady bathrooms. Overnight is not allowed. Nice trail of approximately 7km that surrounds the reservoir. Everything very clean and taken care of.

title: (46350) Chera - 173 Plaça Poligono 4-R.S
description: Lovely parkup at the top of mountain road. Amazing views.

title: (46392) Siete Aguas - Unnamed Road
description: Very remote in the mountains. Fantastic landscape, absolute silence at night. Located directly on several well marked hiking trails. Access via narrow but mostly paved road with several hairpin bends from Siete Aguas. A wonderful place in the middle of nature!

title: (46392) Siete Aguas - 257 CV-388
description: Repsol petrol station. Nice view at 800 m altitude. Parking truck, quiet, catering and karcher for washing.

title: (46392) Siete Aguas - 203 Plaça N 02 Zona Urbana
title_short: (46392) Siete Aguas - 203 Plaça N 02 Zona Urbana
description: Flat area with easy access, super quiet and space for 1-3 cars. beautiful view with the sunrise in the morning. perfect for one night.

title: (46350) Chera - Unnamed Road
description: At the end of the camping path, there is room for 2 or 3 vehicles, with a wooden table. This is the access to the lakes above and the access to the dam. The camping area is delimited by signs (start and end of the area) each pitches have toilets and non-potable cold shower

title: (46350) - 11 Diseminado Pantano Buseo-rs
description: Small parking lot at the dam and the old power station. Driveway approx. 2 km narrow with bad road, pothole to pothole. Not suitable for large mobiles over 6 meters.

title: (46392) Siete Aguas - Unnamed Road
description: A small, flat area to park up over night with a shelter that looks to have a small fire pit area. A place in the middle of the mountains with little or no traffic. Although the access road is narrower than a standard road, it is tarmac and very easily driven given the lack of traffic. There are no facilities.

title: (46367) Yátova - Unnamed Road
description: Camping area, very quiet with walking and mountain biking routes, small river around the area that must be forced to enter the camping area.

title: (46315) Caudete de las Fuentes - Autovía del Este
title_short: (46315) Caudete de las Fuentes - Autovía del Este
description: Rest area 100km from Valencia, taking the exit towards Venta del Moro. In the restaurant (Mediterranean Restaurant) they have some spectacular sandwiches and hamburgers. Highly recommended to eat. Parking almost level, some noise on the highway. Many trucks (get away from the refrigerators if you want to sleep !!).

title: () Cofrentes - Calle Frontón C Río
description: About 5 mins off main road, between grape vines. Little flat area on left hand side, blink and you’ll miss it! No facilities and no people - perfect!

title: (46356) Requena - 938 Diseminado Diseminados
description: It is a recreation area with tables. There is a very nice hydraulic wheel. Routes to do with the bike. Recommended for campers and vans. Not for motorhomes. Although they can access it, but there is little parking spots. We had a very quiet night. Watch out for the rain because the car park is next to the Cabriel River.

title: (46168) Sot de Chera - 8C Calle Ramón y Cajal
title_short: (46168) Sot de Chera - 8C Calle Ramón y Cajal
description: Quiet parking next to the town. Just access for large Ac Next to the river. Nice population Hiking trails.

title: (46310) Venta del Moro - 18 Avenida del Deporte
title_short: (46310) Venta del Moro - 18 Avenida del Deporte
description: Parking next to a park in a separate area from the houses

title: (46168) Sot de Chera -
description: Rellano next to the stream, next to the town and at the beginning of several hiking trails. At 100 m from the point of geological interest "El Anticlinal". Space for 5-6 motor homes

name: Slow Life Camping Venta del Moro
title: (46310) Slow Life Camping Venta del Moro
title_short: (46310) Slow Life Camping Venta del Moro
description: We are a campsite located in Venta del Moro (Valencia). In this town is the interpretation center of the Hoces del Cabriel Natural Park and it is the starting point for hiking and adventure sports such as rafting and canyoning, as well as being able to visit numerous wine cellars, among other activities. We are also located at the top of the town and just 5 minutes walk from the town, with which we have all the necessary services nearby.

title: (46175) Calles - Unnamed Road
description: Free camping area with toilets and barbecues. In the middle of the sierra. The track is earthen, wide and in good condition.

title: (46310) Venta del Moro - 22 Calle Carretera de Tamayo
title_short: (46310) Venta del Moro - 22 Calle Carretera de Tamayo
description: Water source

title: () Venta del Moro - 11 Paseo de las Moreras
title_short: () Venta del Moro - 11 Paseo de las Moreras
description: Park with water intake, shade, benches and easy access.

title: (46168) Sot de Chera - s/n Calle Joaquina Licer
title_short: (46168) Sot de Chera - s/n Calle Joaquina Licer
description: Large parking lot at the belvedere of the Hermitage San Roque. Plan and gravel. Superb view of Sot de Chera. In February nobody. Summer probably isn't. Fountain in front of the Hermitage.

title: (46625) Cofrentes - 21 Plaça Poligono 3
description: Behind an abandoned house and off the road. Great views.

title: (46625) Cofrentes - 34 Plaça Poligono 3
description: Water fountain on the side of the road on the bend

title: (46168) Sot de Chera -
description: Espacio para dos furgos, acceso muy facil desde la carretera, sitio tranquilo y silencioso perfecto para pasar la noche

title: (46370) Chiva -
description: Recreational area "Fuente Alhóndiga" dirt track access. Mountain bike routes.

title: (46367) Yátova - 15 CV-429
description: Quiet corner on the side of the road with 2 tables and benches, just for picnicking

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - 1 Carrer València V Gaet
title_short: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - 1 Carrer València V Gaet
description: Parking in a small very quiet town has the village bar is a butcher shop sells you bread, tobacco etc. Very friendly on weekends a lot of people come to eat at the bar

title: (46160) Chulilla - Unnamed Road
description: Very calm place. Would not drive there when wet. Street can be washed out. No service. No mobile phone network. Right next to a fruit plantation. Drove there with a Mercedes Vito at dry weather with no problems but would not recommend.

name: Bodegas Neleman
title: (46310) Bodegas Neleman
description: Parking next to winery. Place with beautiful surroundings nestled in the Hoces del Cabriel Natural Park. Capacity for 6 caravans, with electricity, drinking water and first class sanitary facilities (toilet and shower).

title: (46168) Chulilla - Unnamed Road
description: Very calm place. Not very straight. Place for one vehicle. Was there with a Mercedes Vito Van for one night. Would not drive there when wet. Street can be washed out. No service.

title: (46173) Benagéber - CV-3930
description: Motorhome parking area. Water Gray and black water drainage. Containers. Picnic/barbecue area.

title: (46166) - 19 Plaça Numero 03
description: Nice picnic spot on a small river. There is a source of drinking water from Pena Maria. On weekends, many locals from Valencia or Valencia come here to climb it, but most do not stay overnight. The internet connection is very weak, but nature is all the more beautiful. Forbidden to stay overnight.

title: (46175) Calles - Unnamed Road
description: Good area to spend the day. With trees by the river. WC, water and paelleros. Following the trail along the river there are more places. Recommended and easy access. No coverage

title: (46167) Chulilla - 2 Plaça Poligono 8-RS
description: Very close to the river, complicated access for large vehicles, I don't know if you can stay overnight,,

title: (46160) La Ermita - 12 Calle Isabel Católica
description: Very quiet and flat place next to the hermitage of Santa Bàrbara. At 50 m there is a bar. Although it is in an urbanization area, the enclave has trees and a beautiful view.

title: (46367) Yátova - Unnamed Road
description: Nature lovers this spot is made for you in the middle of nature by the lake no noise and no passage and magnificent hikes to do

title: (02214) Albacete - 2 Calle Diseminados
description: Quiet place to stop to eat and refill water

title: (46160) Chulilla - 42 Calle Eras
description: Parking Barranquini

title: (46160) Chulilla - 42 Calle Eras
description: Small car park where some city council workers have sent us. As they tell us, you can spend the night. If the AC is very large I would abstain. Ours of 6m without problems. Entry a bit bad.

title: (46160) Chulilla - 63 Avenida Ermita
description: At the exit of chulilla, walking to the town, very quiet playground and soccer field for children

title: (46160) Chulilla - CV-3960
description: Good site in the swamp. Some time ago there were more perfect vans here but they deleted them. the dam is closed, but there are several places to park and spend the night. There are usually people fishing at night and a lot of sow trash. here begins or ends a famous hiking trail

title: (46160) Chulilla - 63 Avenida Ermita
description: Parking Chulilla. You can Stay here if the upper Place is full. No Service but calm.

title: (46167) Chulilla - 34A Calle Eras
description: A very quiet place to spend the night, with beautiful appointments from the town. Access somewhat complicated, but manageable (we did it with an M rifter) Parking for 1-3 AC's depending on how they are placed. It has a higher level to access that is a bit more complicated than this and where 1 or 2 fits. You have the town at your feet.

title: (46393) Loriguilla - Unnamed Road
description: Loriguilla reservoir pier, it has very beautiful views, space for a couple of vehicles, if it is below the reservoir level there are more places and a better "beach", there is no coverage, no source, no garbage or anything, what if there are mosquitoes

title: (46393) Loriguilla - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place, the area is somewhat small but it is a good place to spend the night, easily accessible.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - Unnamed Road
description: Parking lot for hikers, very, very, very quiet road with a wonderful view of the forest and the gorge. The ground is filled with gravel and straight. During the day visitors come and park here. The hiking trails start a few meters along the road. It is about 15 minutes to Pozas del Ral.

title: (46160) Chulilla - 34A Calle Proyecto 10
description: Fantastic view, hard to reach. Better with all wheel drive or 4x4. It's doable with normal traction, but requires more expertise.

title: (46166) Gestalgar - 16C Camino Puente
description: Old football field therefore level ground, I think in summer you have to pay but I do not know how much.

title: (46360) Buñol - 323 Plaça Numero 18
description: Climbing area. very calm. little place. views to buñol.

title: (46166) Gestalgar - 16C Camino Puente
description: Great space to park and spend the night. In front of the paelleros with covered tables.

title: (46367) Yátova - 559 Diseminado P009
description: Secluded area where you can spend a relaxing night

title: (46360) Buñol - 310 Plaça Numero 18
description: Small spot for maximum 3 vans.

title: (46160) Chulilla - 3 CV-394
description: Several parking lots along the road in the middle of nature so superb to descend into the gorges to go to the dam beautiful place there are many climbers who climb the rock

title: (46360) Buñol - 293 Plaça Numero 18
description: Nice little spot, more privat than the other onese in the area. Down the Road 500 meters, is a drinking water fountain. Excellent views and really peaceful. In the town on Buñol, 1 km away, theres several shops, including a Lidl! Bumby steep Road, take Care. Not suited for a Big AC. Down below the parking theres a river, when we were here, in january, the water was clear and shallow- makes for a good swim! Also many friendly  Ibex goats here.

title: (02214) Balsa de Ves - 35 Calle Calvario
description: Pinned to a friend who feet from the municipal water tank. The area is super quiet and has a kind of concrete tables and benches.

title: (46160) Chulilla - 3 CV-394
description: Parking area and quiet . beautiful place among pine trees, and close to hiking trails.

title: (46160) Chulilla - 3 CV-394
description: Quite big spot in the trees. There are places where any car can get and more difficult ones only for 4x4 vehicles but with better sight. Big campers couldn't get there I think. We did it with Fiat scudo.

title: (46199) Urb. las Viñas - 101A Plaça Poligono 14
description: On one side of the road, a space for 2 or 3 motorhomes. The civil guard passed around 5 am and said nothing. We spent the night very well. It's clean, pick up the trash.

title: (46360) Buñol - 272 Plaça Numero 18
description: Roadside drinking water fountain with powerful jet and enough space to stop (even for large vehicles).

title: (46199) Valencia - 8A Plaça Poligono 17
description: Quiet little off road spot, careful as the access is through a windy road. The sign says not prohibited due to a partial road collapse but we entered without any issues. Beautiful spot on the hill with beautiful views. You can eagerly walk down the cliff top and access the lake which is fresh water for swimming/ fishing. Views are a absoloutly stunning. We stayed 1 night with no issue in September 2019. Defiantly worth a visit.

title: (46160) Chulilla - CV-394
description: Small esplanade of earth, rather flat and in the shade of the pines (attention to the eyes with the branches which are low). Next to an ecopark. Road nearby but very little traveled at night. We had a quiet night.

title: (46199) Urbanización las Viñas - Unnamed Road
description: Stunning view of the lake 4x4 needed even in dry weather 4g quiet in nature

title: (46160) Chulilla - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in the countryside, departure of the path of the bridges. very quiet place.

title: (46173) Benagéber - Unnamed Road
description: Camping area, but you can also spend the night next to the water. Paella, tables, bathrooms, waste, bar and also side Aventuria business (adventure). Near the village of Tenerife where they have parking for a caravan.

title: (46367) Yátova - 1A Carrer Bco Tonau
description: Ample parking attached to a large park, spacious and with a fountain. Bar a few meters from a quiet and permissive town with motorhomes.

title: (46160) Chulilla - CV-394
description: Space in nature to spend a night under the pines. No services, very quiet place. Access: 1km500 before Chulilla take the road direction ecopark and picnic area Hoces de Turia. The place is in a bend about 2km from the junction. This road is quite narrow but feasible in camping car

title: (46173) Benagéber - 25-27 CV-390
description: Stopping area, next to the road (very little traveled), to enjoy the views of the Benagéber reservoir, take a good photo, eat, rest, ... No services.

title: (46360) Buñol - 2D Camino Piscina
description: Paved area for 2-3 vehicles. Source with water in the proximity. Very quiet place next to the river. Lunch park. 5 min walk from the center of Buñol

title: (46360) Buñol - 22 Avenida Pérez Galdós
description:
Small plot with busses and cars parked, no signs. 
5 min walk to the town. A bit noisy as it's next to the road but was useful for the stay.

title: (46160) Chulilla - Unnamed Road
description: Space surrounded by nature, without services, near the road (there is little traffic). Flat land to spend the night. Very quiet

title: (46160) Chulilla - CV-394
description: Space for a van on the side of the road. It is not wonderful but you can be alone and calm.

title: (46175) Loriguilla - Unnamed Road
description: Open area in the middle of nature, next to the Turia river and in front of the Domeño waterfall. To get to it you must cross the river, which barely reaches your knees. The area is very wide, many vehicles fit and the road to get there is quite good. There is a pothole but it can be avoided, at least in a camper. We stayed one night in the middle of September and it was very good, both in temperature and in tranquility, since we were the only ones. At most, gentlemen who were going to fish passed along the road, but nobody said anything to us, they just said hello. *IMPORTANT* The part of the road that goes from Valencia is blocked with some cement pylons, but they have a fairly large opening to cross (I have passed more than enough with my Fiat Doblo). If you go in a large vehicle, try to get there from the other end of the road, heading towards Valencia.

title: (46160) Chulilla - CV-395
description: Large place and flat next to the road water if bathrooms no.mesas picnic to eat.

title: (46199) - 8A Plaça Poligono 17
description: Nice little spot with a reasonable view of the reservoir to camp up. We were actually on the way to another location marked on the app but the road had collapsed just after here and we couldn't get any further. This spot is a levelled gravel pad just off the road. Very quiet and Serene. Access to the water. Lots of stars.

title: (46367) Yátova - 102 Diseminado P005
description: Parking access to the Cueva de las Palomas. A small car park 1min from the cave. Near Yátova Camping Area

title: (46360) Buñol - 7 Plaza Ventas
description: Self service laundry. 2 washers, 1 dryer. Paid parking outside for cars. Park at train station for free it is a 4 minute walk. washing smells lovely.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás -
description: Small recess next to the road, magnificent view of the dam. No car passing at this time

name: Zona de acampada Cueva de las Palomas
title: (46367) Zona de acampada Cueva de las Palomas
title_short: (46367) Zona de acampada Cueva de las Palomas
description: Pigeon Cave Campsite (Yatova). Great quiet place (at least a-worth) to visit in an area surrounded by swimming pools, caves and waterfalls following the marked routes. The parking lot is spacious and has enough space. Access is a bit narrow so NOT RECOMMENDED FOR BIG MOTOCYCLETTES, but vans or large volumes, no problem. There are toilets, sinks and a barbecue area. There are also places to get rid of trash. Please use!

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - Unnamed Road
description: Place between quiet trees with direct views of the reservoir, easy access.

title: (46625) Cofrentes - Unnamed Road
description:
Surface of compact earth, but with very good leveling. It has tables and the lake is just attached.
Very close to Corrientes and Jalance.

title: (46175) Domeño - CV-35
description: El Domeño viewpoint of the river Turia. Spectacular to spend the day with views of the river and a waterfall. Very quiet and with a large esplanade

title: (46369) Yátova - 74 Diseminado P001
description: Nice spacious place below the parking lot of Cueva de las Palomas. garbage cans available. Toilet & showers are available in the parking lot (cold water in January)

title: (46625) Cofrentes - Unnamed Road
description: Wonderful picnic area with swimming. There is water from the pipe and trash can. Partly shady, partly sunny.No overnight

title: (46360) Buñol - 34B Carretera Godelleta
description: Quiet place to spend the night, even to leave the caravan parked and go alone with the car

title: (46175) Domeño - 61 CV-35
description: Magnificent picnic area to spend the night. Very calm!! Swamp and river just in place. Ideal to spend the day and night.

title: (46625) Cofrentes -
description: Cofrentes pier parking. Departures fluvial route.

title: (46360) Buñol - 18 Avenida de la Música
description: Free parking near the center. Ideal for stopping during the day and also at night because it is a street with little traffic. In the immediate vicinity there is a park for dogs to run, the Mercadona supermarket and differentiated garbage bins.

title: (02215) Villatoya - N-322
description: Small place for a van in the countryside a few meters from the road, forest roads around.

title: (46173) Benagéber - Unnamed Road
description: Access is via a wide passable track. The spot is practically flat and surrounded by nature. The views are splendid. At night, no light is visible except those of the stars ....

title: (46175) Calles - 2A Calle Valencia
description: A peaceful place to spend the day, or rest by the river, friendly townspeople, there are 3 water sources in the longitudinal area of the river, one in the swing area, another inside a sports court area and the other behind of the wall next to the road and containers.

title: (46175) Domeño - CV-35
description: Picnic area next to a super cool lake. There are tables and a barbecue area. We have only spent the day but there is no sign that prohibits camping or motorhome.

title: (46175) Loriguilla - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place to spend the weekend and start a hiking trail. It is a picnic area with views of the waterfall, clean, quiet and without traffic since the road ends right at the source. Area enabled to make a barbecue, with tables and garbage containers.

title: (46360) Buñol -
description: Excellent parking to see the town and water routes, you can stay since we asked the police for permission and they told us there was no problem, it is next to the Sports Pavilion.

title: (46368) Macastre - 103 Plaça Numero 08
description: Isolated place where you can eat or spend the day in peace (or take a nap) as today is a holiday, everything was crowded in Buñol, so we decided to find a quiet place. This has been perfect. There are fountains, tables and benches, and shade where to leave the van.

title: (46360) Buñol - 359 Plaça Numero 16
description: Paid day parking . Walk to waterfall and starting point of several hiking trails.

title: (46175) Calles -
description: Quiet parking, on the outskirts of the town of Calles. Right next to the Turia river and where to start good hiking trails (water route, rock cut route...)

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás -
description: Chirel Castle Route Parking. We entered the forest track and in a siding we stayed to sleep. A lot of tranquility in the middle of nature

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - Unnamed Road
description: This is an amazing spot, so quiet and so beautiful. If you park here in the corner the road is still accessible (not that it leads to anywhere). At the end of the road there is an abandoned house. Maximum length is about 6m. Please keep it clean!

title: (46625) Cofrentes -
description: Good picnic area with tables, fountain and wastebaskets. It is next to the river, it has a lot of grass and a lot of shadows. It has a playground with seesaw, swings and slide. They pass several routes on foot and by bicycle. It is 5 minutes walk from the town, where there are all services. We have been 2 nights in May and it has seemed a very quiet and comfortable place.

title: (46320) Sinarcas - 27 Calle Virgen del Pilar
description: Quiet town to visit and enjoy nature. The place has drinking water.

title: (46625) Cofrentes -
description: Exit the road towards a wide and firm path that leads to an esplanade of pine trees, excellent for spending the night, and enjoying walks on foot or on MTB.

name: Area Sinarcas
title: (46320) Area Sinarcas
description:
Sinarcas has a Punt Net promoted by the Anti-Depopulation Agenda of the Generalitat with a free service for emptying and supplying electricity. Stroll through the town and, if you want to know how people lived in the past, visit the magnificent Rural Habitat Ecomuseum, a restored old house where implements, tools, furniture and period utensils are exhibited. Very close, the church of Santiago Apóstol.

The town is surrounded by mountains, pine forests that in autumn are a destination for lovers of rebollones. Several trails start from Las Viñuelas, a rural tourism center, to explore a privileged natural environment, with various protected areas.
It has 10 seats and electricity service.

title: (46173) -
description: It's called the Pardala. In a beautiful place to spend the day with great views of the reservoir. Nearby there is a small path that goes towards the tail of the swamp, also very beautiful but narrow and you have to be very careful with children.

title: (46625) Cofrentes - 32 Carretera Almansa Requena
description: Parking sports fields, unserviced, but Jalance is 6 km and has an area.

title: (46625) Cofrentes - 1 Polígono 23
description: Small location (not occupied) at CV 439. Beautiful view of the river, the mountains and the beautiful restored castle. No facilities. Ideal as a lunch break.

title: (46625) Cofrentes - CV-439
description: A secluded, quiet road overlooking the Cofrentes castle and the reservoir area. It is a zone of compact reddish earth, with no problem for campervans.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - Unnamed Road
description:
Beautiful area, very quiet, spent a few nights there, amazing swimming, cliff diving and fishing. Road in is a little rough in spots but well worth it.
CAUTION: Wrong description! It's not a "Place in nature", it's an "4x4 Offroadplace". No way for big Campercars. The stony way goes through a tunnel!

title: (46625) Cofrentes - CV-439
description: Wide open area not far from quiet road; view of near village of Cofrentes and castle and the cooling towers of nearby nuclear power station. Very quiet. Space for several campers if necessary. Not much shade, so, in summer it can be hot.

title: (46173) Benagéber - Unnamed Road
description: To get there you have to go along the track for a long time. is the area of the shearwater. an old picnic area where fishermen currently go. You can go down but better with an agile vehicle to go up the road. The location is an easy place where you can park and see the tail of the swamp. a nice path with a bathroom. Treat the place well and take your garbage

title: (46176) Chelva - 413 Plaça Poligono 30-OT
description: Parking by the river. Recreation area with tables, playground and bar

title: (46369) Alborache - 4D Calle Lepanto
description: Quite inexpensive self-service laundry, it is next to a pharmacy and 10 meters from the Consum where you can park, buy and do your laundry.

title: (46168) Losa del Obispo - 20A Plaça Poligono 5-O.T
description: Esplanade in front of the cemetery. Although it is tilted, there are some places where you can park in plain. Up the stairs of Calvary there is a fountain, tables and a great viewpoint. Asphalted access. Near the town and very quiet to sleep.

title: (02215) Alborea - B-16
description: Site on the side of a road near the highway, quiet and beautiful. There is a bit of garbage as usual. We spend the night there.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - CV-428
description: Very quiet pine forest area with barbecues. We spent the night without problems 500 meters from the road.

title: (46369) Alborache - Camino Molino Galán
description: Starting point for a very light route with children. Depending on the moment you can find quite a lot of garbage on the way, it is a shame because it is quite beautiful. We sleep alone and very quiet. For camper, narrow access.

title: (46176) Chelva - 213 Plaça Poligono 31-OT
description: Parking next to the ermita. Flat gravel park for 2 or 3 vans. picnic bench. There is a fuente (water tap) next to the parking.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - CV-428
description: Spectacular viewpoint.

title: (46165) Bugarra - 25D Camino Cementerio
description: Alternative to pay 5e in the parking lot that is on the river, or at the campsite. Very good access, you don't have to enter the town, which is very narrow. Ideal to spend the day and night, very quiet. You can walk along the river and go hiking to two caves.

title: (46168) Losa del Obispo - 1 Calle de Valencia
title_short: (46168) Losa del Obispo - 1 Calle de Valencia
description: Nice place to stay for about 6 vehicles with a great view in the immediate vicinity.

title: (46176) Chelva - 34 Camino del Hoyo
description: It is a small open space, next to a path and a very little traveled road. They can fit about 4 or 5 large motorhomes. It is an alternative to the car park a little further up. I have not slept here but it is less noisy than the other one. Near the City Center. 5 minute walk

title: (46317) Villargordo del Cabriel -
description: Quiet area where you can spend the night, ideal for parking and going to the different viewpoints of the sickles.

title: (46165) Bugarra - 25B Camino Cementerio
description: River beach parking. It is not allowed to stay overnight. No shade or services. The river beach is very close

title: (46317) Villargordo del Cabriel - 254A Plaça Poligono 4
description: We stop to eat. Lots of tables under the shade of the pines. Covered barbecues, 2 sinks, 1 tap below. I don't think it is possible to stay overnight.

title: (46175) Calles - Barrio Loma Ermita-B
description: Conditioned parking to visit the aqueduct section between Chelva and Calles. No problems to enter with an AC of 7m and change direction. Ideal for those of us who like to sleep alone in the middle of nature. I suppose that in season it will be filled with cars during the day, but at the end of June we were alone.

title: (46165) Bugarra - 25D Camino Cementerio
description: A dirt parking lot next to the river. Spend the night here after leaving us the camping site. Very pleasant night and a bar on the river promenade to eat with very good treatment. On weekends and summer it can be problematic to be in a bathing area. Great early November. Not suitable for very large motorhomes, somewhere at the entrance to the parking lot can be a problem.

title: (46176) Chelva - 84 Avenida Mancomunidad del Alto Turia
title_short: (46176) Chelva - 84 Avenida Mancomunidad del Alto Turia
description: Parking lot at the entrance to the village in front of the senior citizens' residence. Spacious without shade. Good for sightseeing and staying overnight. There is a source of drinking water across the street

title: (46168) Losa del Obispo - 341 Plaça Poligono 3-O.T
description: There is a faucet to the left

title: (46370) Chiva - 2 CV-382
description: Gravel parking lot next to a kart racing track

title: (02215) Villatoya -
description: Access by road but with a large field in the river. Good place to spend a day or two away from everything, without services.

title: (46165) Valencia - 2 Lugar Hortezuela
description:
Liquid Heaven

we found this "fuerte" spot while driving around - so beautiful and peaceful, a lot of birds and some people came fill their warer bottles. ahh and a lot of frigs at night. Your van shouldn't be too big, its quite a small place and also just suitable for 1. the water was awesome, fresh, clean and pretty warm, made our coffee with it - VÆNSEN

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - 50 Carretera la Muela
title_short: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - 50 Carretera la Muela
description: Free parking for motorhomes very close to the town, fenced, with drinking water and litter bins. Beautiful place starting point of hiking and river routes

title: (46168) Losa del Obispo - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic place, picnic tables, 2 water fountains (they told us they were not treated) We did not stay to sleep but at the end of the road there is room for several vans.

title: (46175) Calles - Barrio Loma Ermita-B
description: Shaded, quiet and ideal parking to start the hike "del Aquaeducto de la Peña Cortada"

name: Camping Rio Turia
title: (46165) Camping Rio Turia
description: Bugarra, 66A Calle Buenos Aires. Camping Rio Turia with large pool, not far from a stream, in a small village. Sanitary clean, equipped and shaded location

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás -
description: Small parking lot of a bird observatory. Spectacular views, very quiet at night. We spent one night and there was no problem.

name: Camping La Fuente
title: (02212) Camping La Fuente
description: Camping La Fuente located 1 kilometer from Casas de Ves

title: (46177) - 67 Diseminado Tuejar-r.s.
description: Peaceful and quiet place next to the river Tuejar, with tables for pic-nic and space for barbecue, There is also a spring with two jets of water (Non-drinking poster).

title: (46370) Chiva - 65 Urbanización Vista Alegre
description: Some shade, tables to eat, grill, flat dirt and gravel floor, some walker with dog, per week at night, a car arrives and they leave soon, easy to get in and out, squirrels in the pines that shade the tables .

title: (46624) Jalance -
description: Parking at the trailhead to Canyon of Jucar. Two level places and two sloped ones. Road officially only for up to 3t.

title: (46330) Camporrobles - Unnamed Road
description: The picnic area "Molón", with water, shadows, calm and beautiful views. Part of a route to the Celtíbero Archaeological Park. Possibility of guided tour by calling the town hall of Camporrobles in advance.

title: (46317) Villargordo del Cabriel - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to spend the day next to the old N-III. Very close to the Cabriel sickles and the Contreras marsh. Hiking and mountain biking routes. Now a sign that overnight stays and camping are prohibited.

title: (46177) Tuéjar - 65 Diseminado Tuejar-r.s.
description: Old abandoned campsite that still has some buildings. One of them has a large parking area, two wooden tables and four benches. There are barbecues. You can spend the night. Forest agents usually pass by at noon.

title: (46177) Tuéjar - 911 Plaça Poligono 31-R S
description: In the middle of nature, next to the river, several parking areas, some flatter than others.

title: (46624) -
description: "El Retorno" picnic area just 5 minutes from the town of Jalance. It is located next to an old hydroelectric power plant, now in ruins, through which the river passes to cool off in summer. It has enough picnic tables, and you can spend the night without any problem, there are about 5 places where the terrain is flat, there are some places with shade and the place is surrounded by nature. we accessed without any problem with a 7 m motorhome

title: (46176) Chelva - 60 Plaça Poligono 21 Rs
description: Excellent parking in the hermitage of Remedy. Ideal for hiking trails. Very good views Water and picnic area. Restaurant next to the hermitage and playground. Very quiet area

name: Kiko Park Rural
title: (46317) Kiko Park Rural
description: 'Rural KikoPark campsite. 6 km from Villargordo del Cabriel (province of Valencia). In the heart of nature near a lake. Quiet. Very clean. The campsite is very good, very pleasant with all the services on each pitch. Very friendly staff. Place not to be missed.'

title: (46177) Valencia - 27 Diseminado Tuejar-o.t.
description: Parking by the river. Recreation area with tables, barbecues and playgrounds.

title: (02213) Villa de Ves - 3 Calle Escuelas
description: Very quiet place to sleep, no service, although there are taps for the city to fill the deposit

title: (46177) Tuéjar - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in the Azud de Tuejar area. Special to spend a night in total tranquility in the middle of nature. No services. A 2-minute walk from a recreational area where you will find tables, paella pans, a drinking water fountain and garbage collection. We respect the environment to the fullest.

title: (46177) Tuéjar - Unnamed Road
description: 1 paved car park below and another on the ground above, to the left of the road, 300 meters past the recreational area of the dam of Tuéjar, quiet for the night. Without services.

title: (46624) Jalance - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet and with great views. It is the viewpoint of the Júcar canyons, people don't usually come here and more so now that the Don Juan caves are closed. next to a quiet road. spectacular night. the ground has some inclination

title: (46198) Dos Aguas - Calle de Vicente Gimeno Palau
title_short: (46198) Dos Aguas - Calle de Vicente Gimeno Palau
description: Large flat plain on the edge of Dos Aguas, where we spent the night very quiet. There is a place where mud can accumulate, but when it is dry there is no problem. For us it was a better option than the cemetery. Open, no prohibition signs or private property.

title: (02213) Villa de Ves - B-20
description: Nice place with beautiful views and surrounded by nature, no coverage which allows you to disconnect. The bad that it has no services.

title: (46177) Tuéjar -
description: Beautiful clearing in the middle of nature, surrounded by trees and limestone mountains. A few meters away is a barbecue area with drinking water at Azud de Tuejar. Possibility of doing the Corrales de Silla route. Very quiet, in January it was just us. Spectacular star view.

title: (46624) Jalance - Polígono Industrial el Cerro
description: Jalance area, located next to the municipal swimming pools.

title: (02213) Barrio del Santuario -
description: Flat place with several meters to park and sleep peacefully, that is if there is a sign that says that we must be attentive to floods or floods, if it rains it would not be recommended otherwise yes, and continuing up the road there is also a lay-by to sleep, quiet with hardly any movement, idyllic place to make ravines, walks through nature visiting the old power plant and its tunnel, even taking a bath and going up to the Christ of life to contemplate its incredible views!

title: (46198) Dos Aguas - 12 Carretera Dos Aguas
description: Very quiet pitch at the cemetery of Dos Aguas with beautiful views.

title: (46317) - 621B Plaça Poligono 6
description: Can help out to spend a quiet night. To avoid in rainy season.

title: (02214) Villa de Ves - 18 Calle Santuario
description: Flat place for a vehicle or two, I don't know if it will be private or not, next door there is a rural house it seems, we spend a quiet night surrounded by incredible views and animals, just before going up to the Christ of Life, in which I do not recommend going up With a vehicle the slope is very steep, (but walking up is worth it) you can turn around to change the direction of travel, we loved it !!!??

title: (46198) Dos Aguas - 6 Calle Proyecto 3
description: Parking next to the Dos Aguas pool. Quiet area to spend the night. In wild nature. There are tables and a path to walk.

title: (46317) Contreras -
description: Spot on the way down to the reservoir. Access track quite good and with some inclination. Not suitable for large AC. If the level of the reservoir is too high, the place will be flooded and cannot be used. You have to leave space for the cars that lower rental kayaks. Perfect for spending the night and the next day walking along nearby trails or sailing with a kayak or SUP. *Let's respect the environment-let's be civic-let's leave the place the same or better than when we arrived*

title: (46164) Pedralba - 73 Calle Colón
description: Free parking great for spending a night. Quiet. Local police are tolerant. Water point 50 mtv. Supermarket 150 mt.

title: (46317) Villargordo del Cabriel - Autovía del Este
title_short: (46317) Villargordo del Cabriel - Autovía del Este
description: Remote parking space, a bit of a noise from highway

title: (46164) Pedralba - CV-380
description: Source of spring, untreated water that is rare around here. There are two half inch taps and the sign says "Fuenta de la canaleta. Spring water. untreated". you are going to need at least 10m hose to connect the tap to your van.

title: (02215) - 54 Calle Diseminados
description: Parking in a recreational area in a very quiet area. It has a water point, container and paella area. In the village there is a swimming pool, bars, restaurants and bakeries. Completely flat area of land and with some shade. It has two accesses for vehicles.

title: (46164) Pedralba - 437A Plaça Diseminados
description: Ideal parking to spend one night, at the entrance of the town of Pedralba, quiet, spacious, with bins, there is a public scale for trucks. Ideal to know the weight of your van. In front there is a bar.

title: (02215) Alborea - Camino de los Lavaderos
description: Very quiet place to spend a peaceful night, tables and rubbish bins, walking paths, great if you have a dog.

title: (46389) Turís - 45A Avenida Blasco Ibáñez
description: Laundry la colada, you can park well on parallel streets, we have a pharmacy and bars nearby. good price. They open from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.

title: (16260) Minglanilla - Unnamed Road
description: Parking to start the hiking trail. You cannot spend the night but we have eaten here before starting the route.

title: (46380) Cheste - 22 Carretera Cheste-Chiva
description: Parking sports complex good for spending a night or two. Pleasant, quiet village center nearby.

title: (46317) - 95D Plaça Poligono 5
description: It seems to be the remains of the foundations of an old building, perfectly flat terrain. Some rubble some metal so go carefully. The road passes by but there are few cars and it is pretty well isolated by shrubs. We had a quiet night there. A campsite / restaurant is located on the other side of the valley.

title: (16260) Minglanilla -
description: Impressive views to make a stop along the way.

title: (16260) Cuenca - CV-4661
description: Parking near the tourist office and the starting point of hike Sendero de los Cuchillos del Cabriel. Off-season there was no problem to park and do the hike, during the season it could be crowded as there are only couple of places.

name: Camping La Venta de Contreras
title: (16260) Camping La Venta de Contreras
description: Camping Venta De Contreras located on the hiking trail in the nature reserve Cabriel River sickles. A former coaching inn of the sixteenth century. With shaded areas. Space for caravans and tents. Swimming pool. Inn and cottages with fireplace. Place as it was when the old diligences passed through here.

title: (46317) Contreras -
description: Parking under a bridge, shaded, overlooking the swamp, for a stop to rest or eat. Some highway noise.

title: (16260) Minglanilla - 235 N-III
description: In a viewpoint next to the national highway. A few cars passed all night and some bikers and hikers in the morning.

title: (16260) Minglanilla - CV-4661
description: In the case of finding the P4N with incredible views from the top of the busy port ... Less than 10 minutes away, down the road past the campsite, this small place to eat quietly at the foot of the Contreras Dam. Place with shadow, flat, half asphalted, something dirty, no containers. There's no water. Good to stop to eat is near the road and has good access and exit

title: (46389) Turís - 11 Carretera Silla-Turís Cc.3322
description: Good for dump & refill water. also to overnight.
